org.ambientdynamix.contextplugins.batterylevel

Class BatteryLevelPluginRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambientdynamix.api.contextplugin.ContextPluginRuntime

            • org.ambientdynamix.contextplugins.batterylevel.BatteryLevelPluginRuntime

  • public class BatteryLevelPluginRuntime
extends AutoReactiveContextPluginRuntime
    Example auto-reactive plug-in that detects the device's battery level.
    Author:
    Darren Carlson

      • init

        public void init(PowerScheme powerScheme,
        ContextPluginSettings settings)
          throws Exception
        Called once when the ContextPluginRuntime is first initialized. The implementing subclass should acquire the resources necessary to run. If initialization is unsuccessful, the plug-ins should throw an exception and release any acquired resources.
        Specified by:
        init in class ContextPluginRuntime
        Throws:
        Exception

        public void start()
        Called by the Dynamix Context Manager to start (or prepare to start) context sensing or acting operations.
        Specified by:
        start in class ContextPluginRuntime

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Called by the Dynamix Context Manager to stop context sensing or acting operations; however, any acquired resources should be maintained, since start may be called again.
        Specified by:
        stop in class ContextPluginRuntime

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Stops the runtime (if necessary) and then releases all acquired resources in preparation for garbage collection. Once this method has been called, it may not be re-started and will be reclaimed by garbage collection sometime in the indefinite future.
        Specified by:
        destroy in class ContextPluginRuntime
